New Records: Shadab Khan scored the fastest 36 runs in the Super Four stage of the T20 Asia Cup
Key Match Events: Shadab Khan scored 36 off 26 balls to help Pakistan win by 1 wicket
Rashid Khan took 2 wickets for 25 runs
Fareed Ahmad took 3 wickets for 31 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Shadab Khan was awarded the Player of the Match for his all-round performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan won the match by 1 wicket with 4 balls remaining
